name: Strategy X
description:
Strategy X (ス卜ラテジーX) is an overhead, vertically scrolling shooter released in arcades by Konami in 1981. The player controls a tank through various stages, defeating enemies and picking up fuel. It was ported to the Atari 2600.

Strategy X was made available by Microsoft for its Game Room service for the Xbox 360 and Games for Windows - LIVE in May 2010.
